channel.title: PkingDelay's value?
channel.description:
Does anyone know where I can find the definition of PkingDelay? I went into my client, and searched 'PkingDelay' but only find it when a weapon or spell is defining it. I found int PkingDelay = 0, but I can't find what it actually does, like the math behind it. Anyone know?
Thanks.

item.title: PkingDelay's value?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I’ll look later; I get other things to do now that my clients work. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: PkingDelay's value?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:9, topic:273366”]Yeah, but I’m just looking for what tells the client how long to wait between each attack, depending on the PkingDelay.

Backlash, you were on the fail boat before this started. If you “thought” this was in the wrong section, why’d you post in the first place if you knew it was “wrong”.

I know I’m immature for this, but I must say owned.[/quote]I wouldn’t be surprised to find it decremented somewhere in the process method.

Read full topic
